name: UNION BOILER WORKS, INC., v. Eileen AUGUSTINE, et al. Petition of Eileen Augustine
name_abbreviation: Union Boiler Works, Inc. v. Augustine

parties: UNION BOILER WORKS, INC., v. Eileen AUGUSTINE, et al. Petition of Eileen Augustine.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of December, 2008, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, treated as a Petition for Review, is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
963 A.2d 904
UNION BOILER WORKS, INC., v. Eileen AUGUSTINE, et al. Petition of Eileen Augustine.

Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
